item.title: Analysis Qual Prep Materials - Summer 2022
item.description: Qual Prep Course Resource> Qual Prep Course Resource One of our graduate students Adriana Fernandez I Quero has supplied the materials she used when she taught the qual prep course in summer 2022.

item.title: Officers
item.description: Chair> Chair The Chair is responsible for planning and running the monthly MGB meetings as well as any other open meetings the Chair shall call. The Chair has the then power to convene a meeting of the Executive Board, which may be closed to members-at-large.
